main event: On 29 July 1947, multiple witnesses at Hamilton Field, California reported seeing two unidentified flying objects exhibiting unusual maneuvers in the sky.
interesting points: Two separate eyewitness accounts described the objects as being approximately 15 to 25 feet in diameter., One object followed a P-80 at a high speed, while the second object demonstrated fighter-like maneuvers., Observers claimed the objects had a shiny, white color and were circular in shape., The objects did not produce any sound and left no visible trails or exhaust., The sightings were reported during clear weather conditions, and the moments of observation lasted around 15 seconds each.
witness description: Captain William E. Ryherd and 1st Lt. Ward L. Stewart reported the sightings.
